meanings.definition: A class of chemical compounds derived from toluene.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying different toluidides to understand their properties.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician mixed various toluidides to create a new solution.
meanings.sent3: The toluidides in the beaker decided to throw a party to celebrate their unique structures.
meanings.sent4: The toluidides in the experiment danced together, creating a colorful chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the toluidides appeared like tiny building blocks, each with its own role.

meanings.sent1: The scientist analyzed the different toluidides found in the sample.
meanings.sent2: She counted the toluidides in the test tube and recorded the data.
meanings.sent3: The toluidides on the shelf seemed to be having a meeting about their chemical properties.
meanings.sent4: The toluidides in the container huddled together, forming a united front.
meanings.sent5: Each of the toluidides in the mixture played a crucial role in the overall reaction.
